entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as a reason for Ginny's ban. She says that she will be banned as long as Umbridge is in the school.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is one of the students who is talking to another student about being banned from a certain activity.

entities.name: chaser
entities.description: Chaser is mentioned as a position that Ginny might try out for when she returns.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is one of the students who are leaving next year and currently holds the position of Chaser.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia is another student who is leaving next year and currently holds a position in the Quidditch team.

relationships.description: Umbridge's presence at the school results in Ginny being banned from an activity.
Ginny plans to try out for the position of Chaser when she returns.
Angelina and Alicia are both leaving next year.
